page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: Southend is served by 2 main railway lines. These are the Southend to Fenchurch line and the Southend to Liverpool St. line. In our area (the Southend to Liverpool line) there is the Southend terminus i.e.Victoria Circus. It has two resident engines which are both diesel, all other traffic being electric. There are over 400 employees working from Victoria Station: 90 drivers,60 guards, platform staff, booking office staff, signal and telegraph personel,maintenance men, engineers and cleaners. Southend operates two types of train to London. A twelve carriage fast train and an eight carriage slow train. The slow train has only 8 carriages because many of the small stations have platforms which cannot accomodate 12 carrtiages.
